members.name: Sarah Hawes
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she enjoys playing volleyball, hiking, watching movies with friends, and reading about space science.

members.name: Nick Johnson
members.bio: He spends his free-time building pretty much anything that flies, boxing, and playing the guitar.

members.name: Ben Rotstein
members.bio: He really enjoys theater, and he is one of the managers for a student company that does lighting and sound for events! He also really enjoys skiing, mountain biking, history and geography, and video games.

members.name: Aidan Herz
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, they enjoy participating in the Risley community and doing theatre.

members.name: Kevin Salazar
members.bio: He enjoys camping, mountain biking, hiking, and anything to do with the great outdoors. He is also a big film buff and enjoys watching any and all classic films whenever he gets the chance.

members.name: Matthew Chekhlov
members.bio: He likes to fish many of the lakes and streams around Ithaca, as well as surfcast around Long Island and primarily Montauk. He also enjoys biking and running, and frequently bikes very large distances to fish. Finally, he likes to forge and cast metals in my small home foundry, as well as mess around with amateur chemistry when he has time.

members.name: Katarina Duric
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she plays the piano, enjoys long walks and trying out new places to eat at with her friends. She love reading classics, listening to rock and alt rock, playing board games, and watching thriller movies.

members.name: Reva Nair
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she loves dancing. She has done dance for over 12 years and is on Cornell Nazaqat. She also enjoys all aerospace stuff and loves designing satellites through SSDS's Cislunar Explorers. She is also a member of Cornell Theta Tau.

members.name: Sourish Dutta
members.bio: Outside of rocketry, he likes cooking new recipes from different cuisines and experimenting with them. He also like playing tennis and going on hikes around Ithaca.

members.name: Anchey Peng
members.bio: Outside of Rockety, he enjoys cooking, watching Netflix, and playing with his dog.

members.name: Christopher Lonergan
members.bio: He likes climbing and petting cats.

members.name: Aidan McNay
members.bio: He enjoys playing the chimes, playing board games, and spending time with Rocketry members outside of Rocketry!

members.name: Caleb Farrelly
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he enjoys hiking, flying FPV drones, and traveling the world.

members.name: Stephen Felce
members.bio: Is is a part of Cornell Christian Union, enjoys going on hikes, road trips, and watching movies with his friends.

members.name: Beth Polito
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she is involved in music at Cornell and has performed with various ensembles as a harpist. She is also the Vice President of the Amateur Radio Club at Cornell.

members.name: Will Barkoff
members.bio: He is currently the President of Cornell Hillel, and a member of Cornell Amateur Radio Club. He also TA's CS 3110: Functional Programming and Data Structures. In his free time, he enjoys biking!

members.name: Dean Sheerer
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry he enjoys hiking, drawing, longboarding, and hanging out with friends.

members.name: Gavin Block
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he likes 3D printing, building his own projects, baking, playing guitar, and programming.

members.name: Katlyn Moulia Arriola
members.bio: She is the captain of Cornell's Quidditch Team and sings in the Chorale! She is also a part of the Meinig Family Cornell National Scholars, so she is working on improving her leadership skills. She enjoys costume designing, drawing, and creating future game ideas!

members.name: Cameron Goddard
members.minor: Electrical and Computer Engineering, Infomation Science
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he likes to spend hours on Wikipedia, play the saxophone, and listen to music.

members.name: Yuvan Chugh
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he enjoys singing, playing the guitar, and a capella. He also likes playing soccer, table tennis, and lawn tennis.

members.name: Nandita Nagarajan
members.bio: She loves to sing, and has been singing for about 14 years!

members.name: Matt Bryan
members.bio: Outside of rocketry, he enjoys working for the Cornell Athletic Communications department as a student statistician. He also enjoys researching topics in sports analytics at both the professional and college level.

members.name: Antti Meriluoto
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he likes to play guitar, play soccer, give campus tours, and watch Game of Thrones.

members.name: Ashley Espinosa
members.bio: Outside of rocketry, she enjoys hanging out with her friends and exploring what the area has to offer, whether it's skiing at Greek Peak or Collegetown boba runs.

members.name: Nissi Ragland
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she really enjoys playing tennis! She also loves trying new things and exploring new places!

members.name: Daria Kot
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she enjoys a dabble in art. She also enjoys woodworking and has recently gotten into boxing.

members.name: Charles Chen
members.bio: Outside of rocketry, he is an active as an ambassador for the College of Arts and Sciences, and he is researching data analytics at Cornell's Planetary Habitability and Technology Lab. He is passionate about philanthropy and non-profit service — on campus, he leads the Zambia Community Education Initiative with the goal of constructing a secondary school in Chisekesi, Zambia, and he is the VP of Philanthropy for the Professional Fraternity Council. In my spare time, he likes to play tennis with the university's reserve team, practice my cooking skills, and learn new things!

members.name: Julia VanPutte
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she is a member of a social sorority, the Secretary of the Engineering Honors society, and works at Cafe Jennie! In her free time, she likes to cuddle with her cat Rory, listen to indie music, cook (lots of rice!), read about Data Science, hike, online shop, hangout with her friends, and watch the beautiful ithaca sunsets. Her nickname is JVP the MVP.

members.name: Zach Garcia
members.major: Computer Science, Electrical and Computer Engineering
members.bio: Oustside of Rocketry, he is a member of the Cornell Amateur Radio Club and does research in the Space Systems Design Studio.

members.name: Priya Abiram
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she is a member of the Alpha CubeSat Satellite Research Team. She is also a pilot, scuba diver, and adrenaline junkie.

members.name: Nicholas Natsoulas
members.bio: She enjoys playing musical instruments, learning foreign languages, reading books, and traveling!

members.name: Murphy Klein
members.minor: Potentially Mechanical Engineering or Aerospace Engineering.
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he likes to play ice hockey, and he is currently a member on the club ice hockey team. He also enjoys playing the electric guitar and weightlifting.

members.name: Mary Yuan
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she likes to play sudoku, crochet, draw, and read.

members.name: Matthew Lew
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he loves rock climbing, playing chess, and having a good time with friends. He also loves hiking Ithaca falls and walking around Beebe lake when the weather is nice!

members.name: Spenser Wu
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, he likes to practice editing in Premier Pro and After Effects, visit the pavilion in the botanical gardens, and work in the RPL. His favorite T-shirt of all time is the Uniqlo U Airism Tee.

members.name: Claire Cahill
members.bio: She has studied ballet since she was 3, writes science fiction, and is a big nerd about astronomy and telescopes.

members.name: Nicole Li
members.bio: Outside of Rocketry, she enjoys watching movies, travelling, playing the piano, and going on boba runs. She is also a roller coaster enthusiast.
